post_info.post_title: Is feminISM a brainwashing similar to ChristianISM?

I think just about ALL dogma is ridiculous. Anyone who is fanatical about ANYTHING is usually wrong to some degree. There is a balance to everything and if you are overly partisan toward any group, there's a good chance your wrong about a lot of things. Militant feminism isn't any more ideal than militant Christianity or the Islamists.
 
 That said...for millennia, woman have been the N-words of the world. Just as it took groups such as the NAACP to help blacks get their rights, so too it takes pro-female groups to ensure their equality...and as a conservative I believe that equal OPPORTUNITY is the basis of an ideal society. So I've got to come down like this any group that is pro-woman is good...but if it becomes a group that is ANTI-male it has degraded its own position.
